name: Lonely People Potion Shop
description:
Somewhere deep inside the magical forest forgotten
lies a hut, a potion shop!

~ ~ ~ ✿ ~ ~ ~ The creatures of the lands near and far come visit this tiny place
sharing their stories, feelings,
thoughts on the mystery that's about to unravel...
And it's your job to pour 'em some potions!

FEATURES
✿ 2 h ~ playtime
✿ 10 000 ~ words of potion shop chattin'
✿ many creatures to meet and even more potions to make
✿ freemode!


Part of the Care Package Bundle!
